sqlMap.select: select param_value from s_sysparam_mst where param_id='UBP_BUSINESS_IDS'

SELECT * from C_BILLER_MST WHERE C_BILLER_MST.BUSINESS_ID = #businessId# AND C_BILLER_MST.STATUS= #status#
AND C_BILLER_MST.SHM_FLG='Y'

SELECT * from C_BILLER_MST WHERE C_BILLER_MST.BUSINESS_ID = #businessId# AND C_BILLER_MST.STATUS= #status#
AND C_BILLER_MST.SHM_FLG='Y' AND (C_BILLER_MST.PILOT_MODE = 'N' OR C_BILLER_MST.PILOT_MODE is NULL)

SELECT * from C_BILLER_MST WHERE C_BILLER_MST.BUSINESS_ID = #businessId#
and C_BILLER_MST.BILLER_CATEGORY_ID != 'Telephone' AND C_BILLER_MST.STATUS= #status# AND C_BILLER_MST.SHM_FLG='Y'

SELECT * from C_BILLER_MST WHERE C_BILLER_MST.BUSINESS_ID = #businessId#
and C_BILLER_MST.BILLER_CATEGORY_ID != 'Telephone' AND C_BILLER_MST.STATUS= #status# AND C_BILLER_MST.SHM_FLG='Y' AND (C_BILLER_MST.PILOT_MODE = 'N' OR C_BILLER_MST.PILOT_MODE is NULL)

select * from C_BILLER_MST where C_BILLER_MST.BUSINESS_ID= #businessId# and C_BILLER_MST.BILLER_ID=#billerId#
AND C_BILLER_MST.STATUS= #status# AND C_BILLER_MST.SHM_FLG='Y'

select * from C_BILLER_MST where C_BILLER_MST.BUSINESS_ID= #businessId# and C_BILLER_MST.BILLER_ID=#billerId#
AND C_BILLER_MST.STATUS= #status# AND C_BILLER_MST.SHM_FLG='Y' AND (C_BILLER_MST.PILOT_MODE = 'N' OR C_BILLER_MST.PILOT_MODE is NULL)

SELECT * from C_BILLER_MST WHERE C_BILLER_MST.BUSINESS_ID = #businessId# AND C_BILLER_MST.BILLER_CATEGORY_ID = #billerCategoryId#
AND C_BILLER_MST.SHM_FLG='Y' AND C_BILLER_MST.STATUS= #status#

SELECT * from C_BILLER_MST WHERE C_BILLER_MST.BUSINESS_ID = #businessId# AND C_BILLER_MST.BILLER_CATEGORY_ID = #billerCategoryId#
AND C_BILLER_MST.STATUS= #status# AND C_BILLER_MST.SHM_FLG='Y' AND (C_BILLER_MST.PILOT_MODE = 'N' OR C_BILLER_MST.PILOT_MODE is NULL)

SELECT * from C_BILLER_PILOTUSER_SETUP WHERE C_BILLER_PILOTUSER_SETUP.MOBILE_NUMBER = #mobilenumber# AND C_BILLER_PILOTUSER_SETUP.BUSINESS_ID= #businessId# AND C_BILLER_PILOTUSER_SETUP.ACTIVE_STATUS='Y'
SELECT * from C_BILLER_MST WHERE C_BILLER_MST.BUSINESS_ID = #businessId# AND C_BILLER_MST.PAYEE_SUPPORT = 'Y'
SELECT * from C_BILLER_MST WHERE C_BILLER_MST.BUSINESS_ID = #businessId# AND C_BILLER_MST.PAYEE_SUPPORT = 'Y' and C_BILLER_MST.BILLER_CATEGORY_ID != 'Telephone'
select * from C_BILLER_MST where C_BILLER_MST.BUSINESS_ID= #businessId# and C_BILLER_MST.BILLER_ID=#billerId# AND C_BILLER_MST.PAYEE_SUPPORT = 'Y'
SELECT * from C_BILLER_MST WHERE C_BILLER_MST.BUSINESS_ID = #businessId# AND C_BILLER_MST.BILLER_CATEGORY_ID = #billerCategoryId# AND C_BILLER_MST.PAYEE_SUPPORT = 'Y'
SELECT * from C_BILLER_MST WHERE C_BILLER_MST.BUSINESS_ID = #businessId# AND C_BILLER_MST.BILLER_CATEGORY_ID = #billerCategoryId# AND C_BILLER_MST.PAYEE_SUPPORT = 'Y'
